name: Pokémon Elite Quest
overview: Story: Years ago, the heroic Red saved Kanto from Team Rocket, who had taken over Silph Co. Again, later, A boy named Gold saved The region of Jhoto from Team Rocket at the GoldenRod Radio Station. After Team Rocket's defeat in Jhoto, they disappeared for years, and, after plotting to capture Celebi, the Master of Time, reappeared in the region of Solia. Now, in the exotic region of Solia, A boy turning 15 today is getting his first Pokémon at Prof. Palm's lab. He receives his Pokémon, and heads out to explore Solia, and collect GYM badges. After winning his first GYM badge, traveling through DarkWoods to the next GYM, the boy hears a strange Pokemon cry, sees a small green Pokémon, and he blacks out. When he awakens, everything is black, and he hears voices: "Okay, we go to Solia tomorrow, then we begin our plot to capture Celebi! With Celebi under our control, our plan to g.. ...e... .. ... a... .....e ..." The voice fades, then he hears the strange Pokémon cry again, and he finds himself back in the forest. Features: • Explore the whole new region of Solia! • Many new Pokémon, such as DP, and Fakémon! • Many new TMs and HMs! • Lots of Sidequests and Minigames! • Features of the original Elite Quest! • Team Rocket, but stronger and with different motives! • About 5 or 10 BW Pokémon!
